Changing Default Chart Properties

Note: This topic applies to charting properties in the Windows client only.

To alter default chart options:

  1. Display a chart.

  2. Click the Chart Options button on the Chart window toolbar. The Chart Properties dialog opens.

  3. Select one of the tabs across the top of the dialog:

    • Select General to specify the general chart options, such as chart type, stack style, grid and color schemes, point type and size.

    • Select Series to customize options for each series independently.

    • Select Scale to customize axes settings, such as scale and the increment for tick marks.

    • Select 3D View to change the chart’s perspective, depth, etc.
      This option is equivalent to clicking the Rotate button on the Chart windows toolbar.

    • Select Titles to create or edit the top, left, right, and bottom titles for the chart.
      This option is equivalent to clicking the Titles button on the Chart window.
